channel.title: (glitch?) Door doesn't open in bm_c1a1c
channel.description:
I've guided the scientist to the security office, grabbed the pistol and grenades, went back to the spot where the alien dog(s) appeared, but can't proceed.
screenshot: [url]https://i.imgur.com/M0ClB.jpg[/url] video: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzqT3XQSvo8&hd=1[/url]
map: bm_c1a1c getpos: -2632.370117 -2619.090332 -1047.968750;setang 14.364952 -157.076874 0.000000
EDIT: oh, and the speaker configuration is reverting from "headphones" back to "2 speakers", but that seems to be a HL issue...
